relicDescription: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "CF71787C4CC8334129932B83F6D475C4", "While some Glintbound Bezoars can be quite plain, others boast an otherworldly luster and an irregular shape, resembling a river-worn stone. They are surprisingly warm to the touch and radiate subtle magical energy. While the majority of these stones appear plain grey or beige at first, subtle ribbons of color on their surface shift between deep blues, purples, and iridescent highlights. Flecks of Glint can sometimes give the impression that tiny stars are trapped deep within.")
name: Relic_Common_Glintbound_Bezoar
